A banishment {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spell{/g} is a more powerful version of the {g|SpellsDismissal}dismissal{/g} spell. It enables you to force extraplanar creatures out of your home plane. As many as 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Hit_Dice}Hit Dice{/g} of creatures per {g|Encyclopedia:Caster_Level}caster level{/g} can be banished in a 30-foot radius, and creatures who are closest to the burst's point of origin are affected first.
Dismissal: This spell forces an extraplanar creature back to its proper plane if it fails a {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}Will save{/g}. If the spell is successful, the creature is instantly whisked away.

{g|SpellsRemoveCurse}Remove curse{/g} does not remove insanity. {g|SpellsRestorationGreater}Greater restoration{/g} or {g|SpellsHeal}heal{/g} can restore the creature.
Confusion: This spell causes confusion in the targets, making them unable to determine their actions. {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}Roll{/g} d100 and consult the following table at the start of each subject's turn each {g|Encyclopedia:Combat_Round}round{/g} to see what it does in that round.
01–25: Acts normally
26–50: Does nothing but babble incoherently
51–75: Deals 1d8 points of {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage{/g} + {g|Encyclopedia:Strength}Str{/g} modifier to self with item in hand
76–100: {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}Attacks{/g} nearest creature (for this purpose, a familiar counts as part of the subject's self)
2f01eeff-14ec-44d6-8601-b5cb167ecc59: The creature you designate is surrounded by a glowing red aura of vengeful fate. If the target fails the saving throw, it takes {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}4d6{/g} + your spellcasting ability modifier {g|Encyclopedia:Energy_Damage}electricity damage{/g}. It takes no {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage{/g} on a successful saving throw.

c688030f-ccba-47b2-a8b5-d204790590fb: You emanate waves of intense pleasure that cause all targets within range to falter. a2d79f43-2a70-4163-b54e-2085ff2c3837: You expel a cone-shaped burst of toxic mist from your mouth, subjecting everyone caught in the area to a deadly poison, as per the {g|SpellsPoison}poison{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spell{/g}.
60ad6c70-59da-4240-b415-e2b2684739d5: You mark several allies with a flaming rune. This rune does not cause {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage{/g}, and sheds light as if it were a torch. While the firebrand burns, any creature it marks is immune to damage from any fire {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spell{/g} you cast. All of the target's weapons (both natural and manufactured) inflict {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}+1d6{/g} points of {g|Encyclopedia:Energy_Damage}fire damage{/g} on a hit (this {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} fire damage stacks with any amount of fire damage a creature's weapons might already inflict). At any point during the spell's duration, a creature bearing a firebrand can launch a beam of fire at any target within 30 feet as a {g|Encyclopedia:Swift_Action}swift action{/g}. This ray requires a ranged {g|Encyclopedia:TouchAttack}touch attack{/g} to hit and deals 6d6 points of fire damage. Once a creature uses its firebrand to fire a ray in this manner, the effects of the spell end for that creature.
153de913-80af-4b84-a3b7-076ac27ca8db:
You speak a terrible word of power, setting up potentially lethal vibrations in the chosen target. The target must make a {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}Fortitude saving throw{/g} once each {g|Encyclopedia:Combat_Round}round{/g}, and the effects grow stronger for each saving throw the creature fails.
On the first round, the target takes {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}5d6{/g} points of {g|Encyclopedia:Energy_Damage}sonic damage{/g} and is {g|ConditionStaggered}staggered{/g} for 1 round. A successful save halves the {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage{/g} and negates the staggered effect.
On the second round, the target takes 5d6 points of damage and is {g|ConditionStunned}stunned{/g} for 1 round. A successful save halves the damage and negates the stunning effect.
On the third round, the target takes 10d6 points of damage and is stunned for 1d4+1 rounds. A successful save halves the damage and negates the stunning effect.
The resonating word has no power after the third round, even if the {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spell{/g}'s duration is increased.
b0ab0473-c2d8-46bc-97e6-f1003a752bb9: You utter a single word of power that causes a creature to become {g|ConditionBlind}blinded{/g}, whether the creature can hear the word or not. The duration of the {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spell{/g} depends on the target's current hit point total. Any creature that currently has 201 or more {g|Encyclopedia:HP}hit points{/g} is unaffected. For 50 or less HP, the effect is permanent; for 51–100 HP, the duration is {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}1d4{/g}+1 minutes; for 101–200 HP, the duration is 1d4+1 {g|Encyclopedia:Combat_Round}rounds{/g}.

Your form transmutes into living ice, granting you several abilities. You gain {g|Encyclopedia:Energy_Immunity}immunity{/g} to cold, {g|Encyclopedia:Energy_Vulnerability}vulnerability{/g} to fire and {g|Encyclopedia:Damage_Reduction}damage reduction{/g} 5/magic. You are immune to {g|Encyclopedia:AbilityDamage}ability score damage{/g}, {g|ConditionBlind}blindness{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:Critical}critical hits{/g}, disease, drowning, electricity, poison, stunning, and all {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spells{/g} or {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}attacks{/g} that affect your physiology or respiration, because you have no physiology or respiration while this spell is in effect. You cannot drink (and thus can't use potions).
Your {g|Encyclopedia:UnarmedAttack}unarmed attack{/g} deals {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage{/g} equal to a club sized for you ({g|Encyclopedia:Dice}1d4{/g} for Small characters or 1d6 for Medium characters) plus 1 point of {g|Encyclopedia:Energy_Damage}cold damage{/g}, and you are considered armed when making unarmed attacks.
